actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to engage in public works for the prevention and control of water pollution.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to undertake public works for the prevention, abatement, and control of water pollution. Grants priority to those projects which refelct the most favorable ratio of environmental benefits to costs.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to engage in public works for the prevention and control of water pollution.
